issue.title: [Java] Dataset library (.so / .dylib) able to compile with mvn command
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17418](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17418). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Dataset library (.so / .dylib) able to compile with mvn command

$ mvn clean generate-resources -Pgenerate-dataset-dylib_so -N

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17418?focusedCommentId=17603825) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13889
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13889>
